title: [BUG] MLflow Pipelines cannot get active spark session in Jupyter notebook

labels.name: area/recipes
labels.description: MLflow Recipes, Recipes APIs, Recipes configs, Recipe Templates

body:
### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### MLflow version

1.27.1.dev0

### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Mac OS
- **Python version**: 3.7.13
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**:


### Describe the problem

I tried running the mlp regression pipeline locally using a Jupyter notebook and ingesting data from a source that requires spark. I started a spark session within the notebook. However, the ingest step continues to fail due to not being able to get an active spark session.

### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

Download and setup the example MLP regression repo.

Use spark to read the sample parquet file and write it to a single delta file at `"./data/sample_table.delta"`. Then,
Set the local profile to
```
experiment:
  name: "sklearn_regression_experiment"
  tracking_uri: "sqlite:///metadata/mlflow/mlruns.db"
  artifact_location: "./metadata/mlflow/mlartifacts"
INGEST_DATA_LOCATION: "./data/sample_table.delta"
INGEST_DATA_FORMAT: delta
SPLIT_RATIOS: [0.80, 0.10, 0.10]
```
In the provided Jupyter notebook, run the following to start a spark session
```
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

session = (
    SparkSession.builder.master("local[*]")
    .config("spark.jars.packages", "io.delta:delta-core_2.12:1.2.1")
    .config("spark.sql.extensions", "io.delta.sql.DeltaSparkSessionExtension")
    .config(
        "spark.sql.catalog.spark_catalog", "org.apache.spark.sql.delta.catalog.DeltaCatalog"
    )
    .getOrCreate()
)
```
Finally, run `p.run("ingest")` in the notebook.

### Other info / logs

_No response_
